page.title: 16LIFE STYLES
page.content: THE WHOLE BLOCK IS QUITE WELL SERVED FOR OUTDOOR SPORTING ACTIVITIES, PARTICULARLY WATER SPORTS BECAUSE OF THE CLOSE PROXIMITY OF THE RIVER CROUCH WITH ITS YACHT CLUBS ON EITHER SIDE. SAILING, MOTOR BOATING AND WIND SURFING ARE TYPICAL SPORTS. LARGE PLAY AREAS PROVIDE ACTIVITIES SUCH AS SOCCER, RUGBY, HOCKEY, TENNIS, CRICKET, AND PLAYGROUND AREAS FOR CHILDREN. DURING THE HOLIDAY PERIODS WELL ORGANISED ACTIVITIES FOR CHILDREN TAKE PLACE, AT THE WILLIAM DE FERRERS CENTRE, AND THE TWO SPORTS CENTRES AT HAWKWELL AND RAYLEIGH. ALL THE SCHOOLS IN THE BLOCK OFFER A WIDE RANGE OF EXTRA CURRICULAR ACTIVITIES TO THE CHILDREN DURING THE SCHOOL TERM TIMES.
